ProjectDescription: This React web app will allow players of the game phasmaphobia to quickly filter out what ghost type they are dealing with. click once to confirm an evidence, and click again to exclude it. the program will automatically let you know which pieces of evidence are still relevant. for example, if freezing and EMF5 are confirmed checking spirit box and ghost writing is not needed. the only 2 ghosts left at this point both do not have spirit box and ghost writing.so, fingerprints and orbs will be noted with 'check this!' click the details button to expand on the info for each ghost if desired. playtested several times with great success!

Massive project. This app will let you store your favorite recipes along with ingredients (and auto populate most used ingredients for easy selection during recipe creation), and steps to make the recipe. The driving force for this app was to absolutely minimize typing. for example, ingredients a user creates are remembered and suggested only for that logged in user.  Technologies used: React, mongo, Oauth through firebase, firestorage, react webcam, animations, and styled components.

Mixtape is a social media music sharing website built on node-express and MySQL. It has a simple interface for sharing and voting on playlists. Complex SQL queries and routing so that users can login, upvote and have upvotes properly tallied. example of the complexity: SQL table playlist that belongs to a user, has many upvotes and belongs to many songs.  It works... and its beautiful!
